TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . The respondent Government are represented by Mr PERSON , Deputy ORG - Secretary , ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the GPE and ORG dismissed the applicant 's request for a disability pension . On DATE ORG Director dismissed his administrative appeal . Subsequently , the applicant challenged this decision before ORG .
On DATE ORG held a hearing . On DATE it appointed the ORG to examine the applicant 's state of health . On DATE the ORG submitted its opinion .
On DATE ORG held a hearing . On DATE it appointed ORG to give a second opinion . ORG submitted its opinion on DATE .
On DATE ORG held a further hearing and stayed the proceedings at the applicant 's request . On DATE he requested that the proceedings be resumed .

On DATE ORG held a hearing and dismissed the applicant 's claims . ORG was satisfied that , in view of his working capacity , the applicant was not eligible for a disability pension . On DATE the applicant appealed against this decision .
In the appeal proceedings , on DATE ORG held a hearing . On DATE it upheld the first - instance decision .

On DATE the applicant requested the re - opening of the case . On DATE ORG held a hearing . Relying on further documents and the opinion of an expert , on DATE the court rejected the applicant 's request . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's appeal .
